subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ernie Els surprised the tournament host Arnold Palmer by withdrawing from the 30th annual Arnold Palmer Invitational at Bay Hill Club and Lodge in Orlando, Fla. The tournament — which features the return to play of the top two golfers in the world, Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson — had received an e-mail message over the weekend from Els’s management group that Els, ranked No. 3, might withdraw.
